tool_description: Adjusts base patterns to different sizes by scaling measurements and calculating proportional changes for proper fit across size ranges.

base_size.description: Starting size for the pattern (XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL, custom)

target_sizes.description: List of target sizes to grade to

garment_type.description: Type of garment (sweater, cardigan, hat, scarf, blanket, shawl)

sleeve_length.description: Base sleeve length in inches if applicable (10-30)

error_messages: Invalid base size: Use standard sizes (XS-XXL) or specify 'custom' with exact measurements.
Target sizes array empty: Provide at least one target size to grade to.
Unsupported garment type: Use one of [sweater, cardigan, hat, scarf, blanket, shawl].
Measurement out of range: chest_circumference must be 20-60 inches, length_measurement 10-40 inches, sleeve_length 10-30 inches.
Invalid grading method: Use one of [proportional, standard, custom].
usage: Provide base_size, target_sizes array, garment_type, and key measurements. The tool calculates scaled dimensions for each target size.

size_chart.description: Complete sizing chart with all dimensions

scaling_notes.description: Important notes about the grading adjustments
